templates.name: mv_store_sales_summary
templates.sql: SELECT ss_store_sk, ss_item_sk, SUM(ss_quantity) as total_quantity, SUM(ss_sales_price) as total_sales FROM store_sales GROUP BY ss_store_sk, ss_item_sk

templates.name: mv_customer_demographics
templates.sql: SELECT cd_demo_sk, cd_gender, cd_marital_status, cd_education_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM customer_demographics GROUP BY cd_demo_sk, cd_gender, cd_marital_status, cd_education_status

templates.name: mv_date_dimension
templates.sql: SELECT d_date_sk, d_year, d_moy, d_dom, d_weekday FROM date_dim WHERE d_year >= 1998 AND d_year <= 2002

templates.name: mv_item_categories
templates.sql: SELECT i_item_sk, i_category, i_class, i_brand, COUNT(*) as count FROM item GROUP BY i_item_sk, i_category, i_class, i_brand

rewrite_mappings.SELECT ss_store_sk, SUM(ss_quantity) FRO: SELECT ss_store_sk, total_quantity FROM mv_store_sales_summary GROUP BY ss_store_sk
